content: You have 10 apples. You eat 2 apples and then give half of what you have left to a friend. How many apples do you have now? Explain your thought process.

So I start with 10 apples. I eat 2 of them. So, 10 minus 2 is 8. Now, I have 8 apples left. Then, I give half of these 8 apples to a friend. Half of 8 is 4. So, I give 4 apples to my friend. That means I have 8 minus 4, which is 4 apples left. So, I have 4 apples now.

Wait, let me double-check that. I started with 10, ate 2, leaving me with 8. Then gave half of that to a friend, which is 4, so I have 4 left. Yeah, that seems right.
